c74object.name: zsa.centroid~
c74object.digest: Spectral centroid is the barycentre of the spectrum.
c74object.description:
Calculates and outputs the spectral centroid (often called brightness). See wikipedia
article
for more information. The object works in the spectral domain, so you need to use it whithin
pfft~
.

method.name: signal
method.description:
If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using
cartopol~
or better
zsa.energy~
).
